data.persona: Our royal family is the greatest in history. We have fought and won every war. We are the richest in all the land.
data.description:
You are in the Garden.
Many beautiful types of flowers and plants grow here.  There's a small shed used for store gardening equipment.
There's a flower, a seed, a plant, an eisel, a wheelbarrow, a painting., a shed, a watering can, and a gardening equipment here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a gown.

data.short_motivation: I want to thank the servant for many years of loyalty and amazing work.
data.mid_motivation: I want to grant more leniency to the servant so he can spend more time with his family.
data.long_motivation: I want to hire more help so that all of our servants can have sufficient time at home with their families.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the garden and admire the scenery.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the servant when we notice him starting his daily work in the garden.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get a painting from the easel and present it to the servant. This is a painting of the servant that we worked on together as a family.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat a celebratory meal with the servant, in honor of our appreciation for him.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink wine with the servant after proposing a toast.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: hug the servant again before saying goodnight.
